mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.member.dao.MemberMapper#selectMemberById() */ A.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.member.dao.MemberMapper#findByMemberId() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.NICKNAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.member.dao.MemberMapper#selectEncryptedPwd() */ A.MEMBER_PWD FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.member.dao.MemberMapper#selectMember() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.member.dao.MemberMapper#deleteMember() */ TBL_MEMBER A SET A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
